review: It's a great product wish it had a sd card to expand the memory. Other than that super pleased.
author: Carlos

review: The Firestick would have gotten five stars except the advertisement made it seem like it was battery powered but it has to be plugged up to the wall power outlet to work.
author: Sabrina Lori Brown

review: Once we figured it out, it is wonderful! We have so many options available, our weekend nights are full of rich entertainment.
author: Carolyn Weiner "syndactics"

review: Great product,  does what they say it will do.
author: Michael Palmer

review: this thing is so easy to install, use, and so intuitive. best shiny new object i've bought in years.
author: S. Domville
